full_summary:
================================

### Title and Solicitation Details

* **Title**: Solar Powered Flashing Beacons (Solicitation Number: WS4326739374)
* **Language**: English and French
* **Reference Number**: WS4326739374-Doc4328280838
* **Amendment Number**: 2

### Tender Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of solar powered flashing beacons under Solicitation Number WS4326739374.

### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Tender Period

* **Publication Date**: November 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST (Eastern Standard Time)
Please note that all bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be considered non-responsive.

### Tendering Authority

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Stanley Chui, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Email**: [stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stanley.chui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Business Opportunities

The Department of National Defence (DND) is the end-user of the goods or services to be procured. The region of delivery is Ontario (except National Capital Region).

### Procurement Documents

The solicitation documents can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery platform at the following URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18157371?extsite=MTgxNTczNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18157371?extsite=MTgxNTczNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note that the bid price and additional documentation requirements can be found in the solicitation documents.

### Additional Information

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting
